projects.title: Cyber Brutalist to Art Deco
projects.description: A dynamic visual journey from raw, utilitarian cyber brutalism to refined Art Deco elegance through scroll-based transformations.
projects.content: This project explores the spectrum of digital aesthetics. As users scroll, the interface transforms from chaotic brutalist layouts with exposed grids and glitch effects into sophisticated Art Deco patterns with golden geometries and ornate details.

projects.title: AeroGlass
projects.description: A premium generative art showcase featuring algorithmic masterpieces displayed in a stunning glassmorphism gallery.
projects.content: AeroGlass transforms mathematical algorithms into visual art. Each piece is generated on-the-fly using custom canvas algorithms, ensuring every viewing is unique.

projects.title: Origin Zero

projects.title: Ironclad OS
projects.description: A WebAssembly-powered documentation compiler with an industrial minimal design aesthetic.
projects.content: Ironclad OS brings deterministic, zero-latency document generation to the browser using Rust and WebAssembly.

projects.title: Mnemosync
projects.description: An AI-guided platform for preserving family memories through intelligent interviews and beautiful visualizations.
projects.content: Mnemosync uses AI to conduct dynamic interviews, generating context-aware follow-up questions.

projects.title: GridHive
projects.description: A peer-to-peer energy trading platform connecting solar prosumers through automated micro-auctions.
projects.content: GridHive enables homeowners with solar panels to sell excess energy directly to neighbors.
